revised_title: Tidal Observations in the English Channel and German Ocean
tldr: Captain F.W. Beechey's report on further observations of the tides in the English Channel and German Ocean, made by order of the Lords Commissioners of the Admiralty in 1848. The study confirms the author's previous findings on tidal phenomena and proposes a comprehensive view of the tidal system in the region. The report also discusses the advantages of using a standard like the Dover tide-table for navigation and addresses some common misconceptions about tidal behavior.
